title: AI-Enabled Semiconductor Intelligence Platform
description: A cloud-native platform for predictive maintenance and defect detection in semiconductor manufacturing. Built with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Kafka to process real-time sensor data and provide actionable analytics dashboards.

title: Real-Time E-Commerce Personalization Platform
description: A real-time e-commerce platform offering personalized recommendations, fraud detection, and live inventory updates. Designed with Spring Boot, FastAPI, and React, integrating ML models for dynamic product suggestions.

title: Real-Time Messaging & Collaboration Platform
description: A high-performance messaging system built for logistics teams to track deliveries and communicate in real time. Implemented using FastAPI, WebSockets, and Redis Streams for sub-150ms message delivery.

title: Customer Purchase Behaviour Analysis
description: Analyzed retail purchase data using Power BI and Tableau to uncover customer trends, churn risks, and sales opportunities. Delivered interactive dashboards that enhanced marketing decisions and inventory planning.

title: IoT Predictive Maintenance System
description: Built a predictive maintenance system for IoT devices using Azure Databricks and Machine Learning. Designed data lake architecture and applied time-series analysis to predict equipment failures early.
